sections.heading: FIVE YEAR PRESCRIPTIONArt. 3497
sections.text: Actions subject to a five year prescriptionThe following actions are subject to a liberative prescription of five years:An action for annulment of a testament;An action for the reduction of an excessive donation;An action for the rescission of a partition and warrant
